nicely.translation[0].definitions[0].def: in a satisfactory, pleasant, or attractive way
nicely.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: He was handsome and nicely dressed.
The table fits in nicely with the rest of the furniture.
The garden’s coming along very nicely now  (=it is growing well).
nicely.translation[0].definitions[1].def: in a pleasant, polite, or friendly way
nicely.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: I’m sure he’ll help if you ask him nicely.
